title: 9G
author: 9G
content: We have successfully obtained a license from the Curacao Gaming Authority, and legally hold an online gaming license, and players can view our Curacao Gaming license on the 9G Platform website for details related to it and other important details.https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/09/26/PCL69.pngMore than 450 gaming establishments worldwide are governed by the Curacao Gaming License, making it one of the most popular and recognized gaming licenses in the world.The Curacao Gaming License requires the holder's platform software architecture, RNG (random number generator) algorithms, security, etc. to be fully compliant with the requirements within their jurisdiction to ensure that players are treated fairly.So on the 9G platform, players can enjoy our 3000 + casino games without any worries.At the same time, holding the Curacao gaming license allows us to have a higher reputation in the industry and gain the trust of more excellent game manufacturers.This undoubtedly brings us more cooperation opportunities, 9G platform will strive to bring players more of the industry's latest and most fun gambling games.Thanks to the players who trust and choose www.9g.net, welcome more new players to join 9G platform and enjoy the perfect online gambling game entertainment!

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Congrats, I looked through the site and found the enormous amount of games there, I didn't signup. But tried to ask, via live chat, the support team some question about the casino, but it doesn't load till now. What could be wrong with the live chat page, because I have not joined the website, I'd want to know about the blockchain page I saw on your website. Is it a list of cryptocurrency you accept or blockchain games? However, welcome here, having publicity all over the internet would help disseminate 9G casino to more potential players, especially on this forum.Quote from: 9G on September 26, 2023, 11:39:16 AMAt the same time, holding the Curacao gaming license allows us to have a higher reputation in the industry and gain the trust of more excellent game manufacturers.Where you operating without a license? If yes, that means you've got some loyal players on the casino that trusted the site despite the fact it's not licensed. Definitely, players would crawl into the casino and play with full trust. Obtaining license from Curacao is fine and would boost the reach of your casino, as players like myself check these things before using any casino. Adding more games to the existing ones in the casino is also a welcome development as lots of these games are already played too much and no longer enjoyable. It's relevant to test new games, while playing we enjoy them, regardless of win or loss.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: 9G on September 26, 2023, 11:39:16 AMWe have successfully obtained a license from the Curacao Gaming Authority, and legally hold an online gaming license, and players can view our Curacao Gaming license on the 9G Platform website for details related to it and other important details.Congratulations, now that you have a Curacao license what's keeping you from creating your announcement here and establishing your community, why not get a copper account and hire a designer to design your announcement and start promoting your casino here,  checking your post history you don't have an announcement here yet.You're missing a lot, Bitcointalk is the best place to gain more players and visibility especially if you're doing what the other top casinos are doing, I'm hoping to see you open your official announcement in the coming days.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Welcome 9G and congratulations for obtaining the curacao gaming license that's being looked by most of the gamblers here. I do agree with aioc that you should need to acquire the copper membership for your own thread. Please do read the details about;--> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104.0--> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteAs you can see, the image isn't visible because of your rank but if you do avail that. You'll get privilege like a member rank. Note that we're not getting any commission for suggesting that.It's just that it's a helpful thing to you as you become active in the forum. Treat it as an investment and you'll definitely get to see the difference of your brand when you've got a good designed announcement thread.Also, this thread shouldn't be here in the gambling discussion but must be moved to Gambling --> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0Move it by using the button below on the left side.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on September 26, 2023, 01:31:11 PMYou're missing a lot, Bitcointalk is the best place to gain more players and visibility especially if you're doing what the other top casinos are doing, I'm hoping to see you open your official announcement in the coming days.To open an official account on this forum is one of the thing that other casinos are doing on this forum, but there is another one which is signature campaign. 9G, you can contact a good campaign manager for a signature campaign. These are the campaign managers that I can advice you to contact: Trofo: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1099980Royse777: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=366632Hhampuz: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=881377icopress: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1137579Little Mouse: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2344286Contact any of them if you want an advice on how to promote your casino on this forum.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: 9G on September 26, 2023, 11:39:16 AMWe have successfully obtained a license from the Curacao Gaming Authority, and legally hold an online gaming license, and players can view our Curacao Gaming license on the 9G Platform website for details related to it and other important details.First of all, I would like to congratulate you on the success of the business you have carried out so far and also including the gambling site team www.9g.net with the Curacao Gaming License that you have obtained.What I want to say is, if you can control the www.9g.net site and it can operate, what is important for you to instill is honesty and fairness for users, you have to really provide a sense of security and fairness for users as a whole, Licenses are good, However, that does not guarantee that the www.9g.net site that you are currently running feels safe and trustworthy for users, because we have seen many casinos here that have a Curacao Gaming License, but they still have problems.For this reason, what is important for you to apply on your www.9g.net site is as I said above, it is much more important than the License assessment, don't create a License under the guise of that.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: This is a wrong section, move to gambling board.Well congrats, but I don't really think it's important because regardless the casino has license or not, the most important thing is the casino's reputation.I've tried to access your site, but there's a notice page using Chinese language, I think you need to fix it by changing to English language.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, your casino has a very beautiful designer and congratulations on acquiring the Curacao license, it is true that any business must be operated with a license, so that it complies with government laws, although having a Curacao license is a good thing in the sense that the casino is complying with the laws, the negative part is that the license provider, which in this case is Curacao, when a customer complains about a casino or accuses a casino of being a scam, the license provider in Curacao does not nothing, I've never seen the government of Curacao learning a casino's license because of many scam accusations, I've never seen the government of Curacao arresting any casino owner because of scam accusations against the casinoso I would say that this license is good for only the government to see that you have a license, but in terms of usefulness for customers, this license is useless, it does not protect customers in cases of complaints, to be honest I think that governments should not be forcing online casinos to have licenses, since there are still no laws on cryptocurrencies in most countries and as a result many respectable countries do not give licenses to online casinos easily, they create many barriers and refuse to give licenses and as respectable countries do not They don't give licenses but governments ask for licenses, so the only viable option became curacao.I haven't seen the TOS at your casino, I don't know if there is and I haven't seen it, but I would like to be able to see and read the TOS at your casino, I want to understand the kyc rules, the bonus rules and more. Many casinos have absurd rules about withdrawal and bonus requirements, things like high minimum withdrawal amounts and 3x or more wager to be able to withdraw, become a big headache and that's why it's important to read the TOS to know this and then decide whether it would be good to create an account or not

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: The Curacao license is just one of the pieces of the puzzle to establishing your reputation, your domain is good I assume this is a purchased domain https://www.whois.com/whois/9g.netDomain:9g.netRegistrar:GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On:2002-04-29Expires On:2025-04-28Updated On:2023-09-15Why announce a license curacao without opening an official thread here there should be an ongoing discussion about your platform not just about your license, we want to know more about your casino's feature bonuses and all your plans here in Bitcointalk but its not going to happen if you're not going to launch an official announcement so its better to start one, the sooner the better.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: QuoteBlockchain Caça-níqueis Pesca PôquerNot sure if you are aware of it but the quote above is what your navigation looks like, seems you set it to Spanish by default. And the notice that pops up is also in Chinese (推荐返利 VIP等级以及对应的权益)The site looks good and the domain is quite rare these days.  But you probably have to take time launching casinos, the logo is like created by someone who just learned Photoshop in a day.Welcome to Bitcointalk.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: To put it in context, this casino advertise that you'll make a fortune: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5467700.0. That's bold and I mean it's fine publicity but other red flags seems like showed on that thread already. Well, not judging them but I'll advice to just stay away one way or another.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on September 26, 2023, 03:19:43 PMQuoteBlockchain Caça-níqueis Pesca PôquerNot sure if you are aware of it but the quote above is what your navigation looks like, seems you set it to Spanish by default. And the notice that pops up is also in Chinese (推荐返利 VIP等级以及对应的权益)The site looks good and the domain is quite rare these days.  But you probably have to take time launching casinos, the logo is like created by someone who just learned Photoshop in a day.Welcome to Bitcointalk.Haha, that's exactly what I was thinking.As of now, the homepage is a total mess. Mainly English mixed with some random Chinese and Spanish and so on. Feels like you are reading the menu of some kind of Asian/European fusion restaurant.Also I seriously doubt you are an official partner of FIBA to be honest. They won't give their name to a total no name I believe.Still, welcome and prove me wrong.
